page.title: 17Guiding in Hereford.
page.content: { Every Tuesday evening I go to{Guides from 7p.m. to 9.p.m. We pay our subs which are 20p each week. There are six {patrols;}Bullfinches, Chaffinches, Kingfishers, Nightingales, Robins and Swallows. I am in a patrol called Nightingales. We normally do cooking, drawing, sewing and many other things. A couple of weeks ago our Guides cooked over an open fire. We cooked sausages and baked bananas. In Guides we can gain{badges}by working for them. Our{uniform}is a navy-blue skirt, blue blouse,a green necker, a blue guide hat and black or brown shoes. In Guides I have already gained 13 badges.
